mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from muse.message_template
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from muse.message_template
order by ${orderByClause}
select id, name from muse.message_template where uid = #{uid} and valid = 1 and type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by id desc limit 100
select id, name from muse.message_template where uid = #{uid} and type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and valid = 1 and name like #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by id desc
select id, name from muse.message_template where uid = #{uid} and valid = 1 and name like #{name}

`uid`,
`name`,
`type`,
`status`,
create_time,
update_time,
`valid`,
description,

update muse.message_template
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`uid` = #{record.uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`name` = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`type` = #{record.type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`valid` = #{record.valid,jdbcType=BIT},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
